verb.description: Determine (the amount or number of something) mathematically.
examples: Japanese land value was calculated at 2.5 times that of the U.S
he calculated that Texas would gain four new seats in the House of Representatives

verb.description: Intend (an action) to have a particular effect.
examples: his last words were calculated to wound her

origin: Late Middle English: from late Latin calculat- counted, from the verb calculare, from calculus a small pebble (as used on an abacus).
